Body:
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternUniform(normalization=1.0, regions=[(0, 1, 1,
    4), (2, 3, 1, 4)])
image = np.array([[0.0, 1.0, 2.0, 2.0, 2.0], [0.0, 1.0, 3.0, 3.0, 3.0], [
    0.0, 1.0, 4.0, 4.0, 4.0]])
frame = ci_frame.ChInj(frame_geometry=ci_frame.FrameGeometry.
    euclid_bottom_left(), ci_pattern=pattern)
serial_region = frame.serial_calibration_sub_arrays_from_frame(array=image)
assert (serial_region[0] == np.array([[0.0, 1.0, 2.0, 2.0, 2.0]])).all()
assert (serial_region[1] == np.array([[0.0, 1.0, 4.0, 4.0, 4.0]])).all()
